item.title: It's a Sidekick and a Running Mate
item.description:
The T-Mobile Sidekick Slide is perfect for those who love to stay connected. Its compact design easily fits into your pocket, keeping you in touch even during a workout. While it functions as a cell phone, its primary use lies in its messaging capabilities. Accessing the full QWERTY keyboard is as simple as sliding the phone open, transforming it into a miniature computer. The large, vibrant display and physical keys enhance the user experience...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/its-a-sidekick-and-a-running-mate/

item.title: Going Incognito With SANYO and Sprint
item.description:
When you need a phone for discreet texting, the SANYO Incognito from Sprint is the perfect choice. Its sleek, minimalist design resembles a small, black monolith. Don’t be fooled by its understated appearance, though, as this phone is packed with features. The mirrored shell conceals a monochrome display and essential buttons for making calls. Open the SANYO Incognito to reveal a full QWERTY keyboard with generously sized keys, perfect for rapid texting...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/going-incognito-with-sanyo-and-sprint/

item.title: LG enV2 Sparks Envy Too
item.description:
The LG enV, nicknamed the “envy phone,” certainly attracted attention. Its successor, the enV2 VX9100, takes it up a notch, especially for those who love texting, gaming, and enjoying media on their phone. The standout feature of the enV2 is its hidden full QWERTY keyboard. No need to fumble with a virtual keyboard on this phone! It boasts a real keyboard with comfortably sized keys. Keep your enV2 closed for calls, just like any other standard phone...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/lg-env2-sparks-envy-too/

item.title: Economic Woes Drive Rural Telegraphy Initiative
item.description:
The recent economic downturn has forced a reevaluation of strategies for providing digital communication to rural communities. Access to the internet and even cell phone service is notoriously limited in these areas. While the Rural Broadband Initiative, part of the economic stimulus plan, aimed to address this issue by funding fiber optic cable installation, those funds have unfortunately been redirected. Robb M. Blihnd, a hedge fund manager, explained that the funds were considered more essential for urban and suburban areas...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/economic-woes-drive-rural-telegraphy-initiative/

item.title: Going Rogue But Not Rouge With Samsung
item.description:
If you’re a go-getter in need of a powerful cell phone that won’t let you down, the Samsung Rogue U960 Black for Verizon Wireless is a top contender among smartphones. Does your current phone offer easy access to social media apps like Facebook and MySpace? How about web browsing, YouTube videos, and photo editing on a bright screen, even in sunlight? Can you stream music wirelessly, get directions, or message easily with a physical QWERTY keyboard?..
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/going-rogue-but-not-rouge-with-samsung/

item.title: Your Ally In The Android vs iPhone Battle
item.description:
LG’s initial Android offering, the LG Ally for Verizon Wireless, is a remarkable device. It boasts a range of features and access to a vast library of apps on the Android Market. If you prioritize texting and email, you’ll appreciate the tactile feedback of real keys. The LG Ally features a 3.2-inch touchscreen and a slide-out QWERTY keyboard with well-sized keys. With five customizable home screens, you can personalize it with numerous Android apps...

item.title: Democracy In a Cell Phone
item.description:
At this very moment, the American Red Cross has already received $22 million in donations for Haiti earthquake relief through text messages, a number that is expected to climb even higher. This massive demonstration of support is considered groundbreaking, possibly indicating a societal shift rather than a one-time occurrence. The $22 million figure is impressive considering it was accumulated in approximately a week, with each donor contributing $10. This means millions of people acted independently yet almost simultaneously when the call for help was issued...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/democracy-in-a-cell-phone/
